subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: Compliance with F4P1, for the number of sanitary facilities, is verified when queuing modelling predicts that occupant waiting time for sanitary facilities is at least equivalent to the waiting time predicted using the respective Deemed-to-Satisfy Provisions.

subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: For calculations performed under (1), the occupant waiting time is determined as the 90th percentile wait time at maximum population.

subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: Queuing modelling in (1) must reflect the following:

ol.li: Function or use of the building.
The disability or other particular needs of the occupants.
